turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, please.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! I can help with that. Are you an existing patient of Dr. Ramirez?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I am. I was last there about six months ago, I think.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, great. To confirm, what is your date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's 03/15/1988. And what's her earliest availability? I really need to be seen soon. This rash is driving me crazy!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I see that Dr. Ramirez has an opening on Tuesday, October 29th at 10:00 AM. Would that work for you? Alternatively, there is a slot on November 5th at 2:30 PM.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, almost two weeks away? Is there absolutely *nothing* sooner? Maybe a cancellation list I could be added to?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me check. We do not currently have a cancellation list, but I can check if any other doctors in the practice have sooner availability. Would you like me to check for other doctors?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please do! But only if they are familiar with dermatology, I don't want to explain everything from scratch. I just need someone to look at this rash.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, one moment while I check our dermatologists availability. Dr. Lee has an opening this Friday at 9 AM. Will that time work for you?
